Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not after); ROMAN PERIOD (not before)
Name: Statuette
Description: Statuette of a sitting woman, legs apart, with the soles of her feet almost touching. Clothing covers the back and the legs. A piece of fabric also covers the arms. The chest and belly are bare. A necklace(?) crosses over between the breasts with a cabochon at the intersection.
